description:
As Abigail`s plans go awry and the assassins are all defeated, he has no choice but to go under the Castle of Meta-llicana himself. He is after Sheila`s seal. But... Arshes Nei, the Thunder Empress, stands in the way. It’s the great battle between Abigail, Prophet of the Underworld, and Nei, Thunder Empress.
Source: Official Website
